# showsCloseControl

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the Look Around view displays a close control.

## Declaration

```swift
get showsCloseControl(): boolean;
set showsCloseControl(value: boolean);
```

## Controlling the display of window controls

- **showsDialogControl**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Look Around view displays shows a control that allow someone to expand the Look Around view.
